channel.title: papers on Carlo Cavicchia
channel.description: Recent content in papers on Carlo Cavicchia

item.title: ongoing projects
item.description: my current researches are: Cavicchia, C., Vichi, M. and Zaccaria, G. Gaussian mixture model with an extended ultrametric covariance structure the maximum likelihood estimation of a Gaussian Mixture Model where the covariance structure is modeled according to an extended ultrametric covariance matrix, the model extends the concepts and definitions of ultrametric matrix in order to model generic covariance structure. (Revision requested) Cavicchia, C. and Sarnacchiaro, P.

item.title: publications
item.description: refereed journal articles Cavicchia, C. and Vichi, M. Second-order Disjoint Factor Analysis Psychometrika, (2021) Cavicchia, C. and Sarnacchiaro, P. A multi-group higher-order factor analysis for studying the gender-effect in Teacher Job Satisfaction METRON, (2021) Cavicchia, C., Sarnacchiaro, P. and Vichi, M. A composite indicator for the waste management in the EU via Hierarchical Disjoint Non-Negative Factor Analysis Socio-Economic Planning Sciences, 73, (2021) Cavicchia, C.
